name: Tomy: The Circle
description:
Tomy: The Cricle is a physics based 2D platformer with 9 developer-made levels and a level editor. Lost interest in the project, so i decided to release it.

Cut during development:

->Any kind of audio.

->support for online hosted levels.

From editor to community level browser:

  1.  Open %appdata%\Tomy_The_Circle
  2. Copy the editor.txt file located in the "editor" folder
  3. Paste the file in the "commlevels" folder
  4. Change the file extension to ".lvl".
  5. You can rename the file. Any name will become the level name.
